title: react笔记！
content:
前端常用小方法

1、浏览器监听是否全屏

window.onresize = function (){
  var isFull = document.fullscreenElement || document.mozFullScreenElement || document.webkitFullscreenElement || document.msFullscreenElement;
  if(isFull){
    console.log('全屏')
  } else{
  	console.log('没有全屏')
  }
}

2、禁用某一个按钮（这个是禁用F11）

window.onkeydown = function (event) {
    if (event.keyCode === 122) {
      event.preventDefault()
      event.returnValue = false
    }
  }

3、实现点击全屏

// 全屏
    function launchFullScreen(element) {
        if (element.requestFullscreen) {
            element.requestFullscreen();
        } else if (element.mozRequestFullScreen) {
            element.mozRequestFullScreen();
        } else if (element.webkitRequestFullscreen) {
            element.webkitRequestFullscreen();
        } else if (element.msRequestFullscreen) {
            element.msRequestFullscreen();
        }
    }

//退出全屏
function exitFullscreen() {
    console.log(1111);
    if (document.exitFullscreen) {
        window.document.exitFullscreen();
    } else if (document.mozExitFullScreen) {
        window.document.mozExitFullScreen();
    } else if (document.webkitExitFullscreen) {
        window.document.webkitExitFullscreen();
    }
}

4、JavaScript强制刷新页面

window.location.reload() *// 强制页面刷新*

5、Echarts和Datav实现响应式

1、Echarts 

window.addEventListener('resize',function(){

 	myChart1.resize()
   mychart2.resize()

 })

2、datav

给需要响应式的图表添加一个key，在父容器发生变化的时候，更新key值即可。
